introduction-online-content: (Facebook, Zalo, Website, Instagram, Lazada, Pancake, Kiot Việt…) need to automate responses, close orders, and not miss customers at any time.
introduction-sme-content: Want to optimize resources, save personnel costs, and operate while ensuring uniform service quality.
introduction-retail-content: Want to increase sales, reduce operating costs, and provide 24/7 customer care.
service-title: Why AZbot is the Optimal Choice?
service-content: AZbot provides solutions to help AI chatbots design specifically for businesses!
service-content-1: AZbot helps businesses reduce up to 80% of personnel, operational, and training costs compared to traditional models.
service-title-2: Close deals 24/7 - Never miss a customer
service-content-2: AZbot operates continuously, consulting and closing deals 24/7, ensuring every “golden” opportunity is utilized, even outside of business hours.
service-content-3: AZbot can respond to hundreds, even thousands of customers simultaneously without being overloaded, helping businesses scale without worrying about operational bottlenecks.
service-content-4: According to internal statistics, 99.9% of customers receive immediate responses from AZbot, enhancing customer experience and satisfaction.
service-content-5: AZbot always provides accurate, consistent information according to the programmed script, reducing errors by up to 99% compared to traditional consultants, ensuring uniform service quality.
service-content-6: Responds in a natural, friendly manner and keeps up with trends to be closer to customers.
package-content: AZbot's uniqueness helps you create value.
work-flow-content: Only 1 week to complete the entire chatbot for your business!
work-flow-step-1-content: Research products and understand customer needs
work-flow-step-2-content: Consult and set up AI into the sales channel
work-flow-step-3-content: Test to improve the chatbot to better suit the customer of the business
work-flow-step-4-content: AZbot accompanies customers throughout to ensure the best quality and efficiency
feedback-title: What our customers say about us
feedback-content: AZbot has had the opportunity to accompany many businesses and received positive feedback
feedback-1: Since AZbot, customers can ask at 2-3am and still get an answer, no longer having to wait until the next morning for consultation.
feedback-1-content: AZbot is the best companion for your business. Customers can ask questions at any time, and AZbot will respond immediately, ensuring no missed opportunities.
feedback-2: Especially, on days with large sales, even with thousands of messages, AZbot can handle them all without missing any customers.
feedback-2-content: AZbot is the best companion for your business. Customers can ask questions at any time, and AZbot will respond immediately, ensuring no missed opportunities.
feedback-3: Chatbot can also remind customers to return and buy again, and provide natural consultation advice.
feedback-3-content: AZbot can also remind customers to return and buy again, and provide natural consultation advice.
feedback-4: Chatbot can handle complex questions related to specific crops or livestock, helping us provide better customer support.
feedback-4-content: AZbot can handle complex questions related to specific crops or livestock, helping us provide better customer support.
experience-description: Close orders 24/7 - Reduce 80% costs - Increase 99.9% response rate
solution-description: Solve all sales challenges with a single tool!
solution-1-description: No need to spend time setting up Albot, with a dedicated team of experts to support long-term optimization and operation for each business
solution-2-description: Support management even when using third-party platforms like Pancake Kiot Việt,...
solution-3-title: Reasonable cost - Support up to 100,000 messages/month
solution-3-description: With a reasonable cost, AZbot supports businesses to communicate up to 100,000 orders/month suitable for medium and large businesses
solution-4-description: AZbot is trained naturally according to the brand's language style to create a friendly and professional feel for customers
solution-5-description: Not only does AZBot answer, but it also provides deep consultation, suggesting additional products cleverly according to each campaign to increase the average order value by up to 35% (based on test data on 50 retail businesses)
